posts.post_content:
A pretty decent common for a vampire deck, except it is a tad slow. Turn 3, this. Turn 4, tap this and another vamp. The earliest this can attack(unless you mana-acceled) would be turn 5.  
  
...And seriously? All the comments are about her cleavage?
